generated.css: *,:after,:before{box-sizing:border-box}blockquote,body,dd,dl,figure,h1,h2,h3,h4,html,p{margin:0;padding:0}::selection{background-color:#101820;color:#f95700}ol[role=list],ul[role=list]{list-style:none}ul{padding-left:0}html{font-size:16px;min-height:100%;scroll:smooth}html:focus-within{scroll-behavior:smooth}body{text-rendering:optimizeSpeed;line-height:1.5;min-height:100%;background:url(/2fae51b4c9660e5d5018f58bfaa925f4.png) repeat;background-position:0 87%;background-color:#2b2b2b;color:#fdf3f0}a:not([class]){text-decoration-skip-ink:auto}a{font-family:Open Sans,sans-serif;text-decoration:none;color:#fdf3f0;transition:.3s ease-in}img,picture,svg{max-width:100%;display:block}button,input,select,textarea{font:inherit}.fab{font-style:normal}.orange-bar{width:100%;border:1px solid #ff754f}nav ul li a{text-transform:uppercase;font-weight:600}.nav{justify-content:space-around;align-items:center;padding:3em;margin:auto 0}.nav,.nav__navlist{display:flex}.nav ul li+li{margin-left:2em}.nav__burger,.nav__navlist-logo{display:none}.nav__burger div{width:25px;height:2px;background-color:#fdf3f0;margin:5px;transition:all .3s ease}.header,.header__banner{display:flex;flex-direction:column}.header__banner{padding:12em 50%;background-color:rgba(49,48,48,.6705882352941176);background-size:auto;text-transform:uppercase;width:100%}.header__title{border-left:.3em solid #ff754f;line-height:.75em;padding-left:.2em;font-size:1.25rem}.header__countdown h1,.header__title{font-family:Open Sans,sans-serif;font-weight:600}.header__countdown h1{font-size:7.451rem;color:#ff754f}.header__countdown-labels{font-family:Open Sans,sans-serif;font-size:1rem;font-weight:600;display:flex;justify-content:space-around;margin:auto 0;padding-bottom:2em}.header__buttons{display:flex;justify-content:space-evenly;align-items:center}.header__buttons a{justify-content:space-evenly;font-family:Open a:hover{background-color:rgba(255,117,79,.4196078431372549)}.FAQ{display:flex;justify-content:center;flex-direction:column;align-items:center;text-align:center;font-family:Open .2em;margin:0 auto;font-size:1.25rem;display:block;max-width:50%;line-height:2}.amazonLink{color:#fdf3f0;transition:.3s ease-in;border-bottom:.5px solid #ff754f}.amazonLink:hover{color:#ff754f;transition:transform .3s ease-out}.nav__navlist a{color:#fdf3f0;transition:.2s ease-in;font-family:Open Sans,sans-serif;font-size:1.25rem}.nav__navlist a:hover{color:#ff754f}.logo{width:200px}.footer{padding:2em;display:flex;background-color:#2b2b2b;justify-content:space-between;align-items:center;font-family:Open Sans,sans-serif;font-weight:400}@media screen and (max-width:768px){body{overflow-x:hidden}.nav{justify-content:space-between}.nav ul{margin-top:0}.nav ul li+li{margin-left:0;margin-top:1em;text-align:right}.nav__navlist{position:absolute;right:0;height:100%;top:10%;bottom:0;background-color:#2b2b2b;width:50%;display:flex;flex-direction:column;justify-content:start;align-items:center;transform:translateX(100%);padding:0;margin-top:0;transition:transform li:first-child{margin-bottom:2.5em;margin-top:2.5em}.nav__navlist-logo{display:block}.nav__burger:hover{cursor:pointer}.logo-hidden{visibility:hidden}.nav-active{transform:translateX(0);transition:.5s
